tasks.task: Drive a combine harvester to harvest crops.
subtasks: Sit in the cab of the combine harvester.
Start the engine of the combine harvester.
Monitor the harvesting process on the field.
Adjust the combine harvester's settings as needed.
Stop the combine harvester at the appropriate times.
Drive the combine harvester back to the storage area.

tasks.task: Operate a grain auger to transfer harvested grain.
subtasks: Position the grain auger at the loading point.
Connect the grain auger to the combine harvester's unloading system.
Start the grain auger and monitor its operation.
Stop the grain auger when finished or when unload site is reached.

tasks.task: Load harvested grain into a truck.
subtasks: Drive the grain truck to the loading area.
Stop the grain truck at the loading site.
Position the truck bed for grain unloading.
Open the grain truck's unloading flap or door.
Monitor the grain flow into the truck.
Close the truck's unloading flap or door when finished.
Drive the grain truck away from the loading site.

tasks.task: Transport harvested grain to the grain elevator.
subtasks: Drive the grain truck to the grain elevator.
Stop the truck at the unloading dock of the grain elevator.
Hook up a grain auger or similar system to unload the truck.
Unload the grain from the truck into the grain elevator.

tasks.task: Machine a field with a grain drill.
subtasks: Set up the grain drill in the field according to crop requirements.
Attach seed boxes and fertilizer applicators to the drill.
Drive the grain drill over the field, sowing seeds at the correct depth and spacing.
Adjust drilling speed and seed placement as necessary.
Monitor seed and fertilizer placement during the drilling process.

tasks.task: Space crops in the field using a grain drill.
subtasks: Determine the appropriate seed spacing based on crop type.
Load seeds into the grain drill's seed boxes.
Distribute the seeds evenly across the field as the drill is operated.

tasks.task: Plant crops via a grain drill.
subtasks: Prepare the field with proper soil conditions for planting.
Set the grain drill to the appropriate planting depth and seartherm setting.
Operate the grain drill, planting seeds at the required depth and spacing.
Check the grain drill's performance and adjust as needed during planting.

tasks.task: Reset a screw conveyor on a grain dryer when it gets clogged.
subtasks: Halt the grain dryer operation to access the clogged screw conveyor.
Locate and remove the blockage from the screw conveyor.
Clean the affected area of the screw conveyor.
Realign or replace any parts as necessary.
Test the screw conveyor for proper operation.
Resume operation of the grain dryer.

tasks.task: Inspect and adjust a rotating dryer basket.
subtasks: Check the dryer basket for wear or damage.
Test the basket's rotation and adjust balance if necessary.
Lubricate moving parts of the basket.
Secure any loose components on the basket.

tasks.task: Clean the heating unit in a grain dryer.
subtasks: Access the heating unit enclosure.
Remove dust, debris, and soot from the heating elements.
Inspect heating elements for damage or wear.
Replace any damaged heating elements.
Test the heating elements for proper function.
Inspect all moving parts for wear or damage.
Check fluid levels and add as necessary.
Clean filters and replace them if clogged.
Test safety mechanisms to ensure proper operation.

tasks.task: Set up a storage bin for grain with a cone mixer.
subtasks: Position the cone mixer in the desired location.
Connect the cone mixer to the grain delivery system.
Start the cone mixer and test its function.
Monitor the mixing of grain for proper blending.

tasks.task: Combine various types of grain in a cone mixer.
subtasks: Transfer different grain types into the cone mixer.
Operate the cone mixer to blend the grains together.

tasks.task: Operate a corn picker to harvest corn.
subtasks: Drive the corn picker through the cornfield.
Adjust the picker's head to properly cut the corn stalks.
Ensure the corn is cut at the correct height.
Attach the corn picker's collection system (like a basket or auger) to collect the corn.
Drive the corn picker back to the storage area or processing facility.

tasks.task: Move harvested crops from the field to the storage bins with a forklift or similar equipment.
subtasks: Load the harvested crops into the forklift's forks.
Drive the forklift to the desired storage location.
Position the forklift under the storage bin or silo.
Unload the crops from the forklift onto the storage bin.

tasks.task: Use a separator to further process corn after picking.
subtasks: Set up the separator at a suitable location.
Feed the harvested corn into the separator for processing.

tasks.task: Unload grain from a train car into a grain handler.
subtasks: Position the grain unloading train car next to the grain handler.
Attach the Unloader to the train car's discharge pipe.
Start the unloading process and monitor the grain flow.
Stop the unloading when the car is empty or when necessary.

tasks.task: Operate a grain elevator to transfer grain into storage silos.
subtasks: Align the grain elevator bucket elevator over the storage silo.
Start the bucket elevator and fill the silo with grain.
Monitor the grain transfer rate to avoid overfilling the silo.

tasks.task: Load manure into an applicator for land application.
subtasks: Position the manure applicator in the field.
Attach a manure spreader or injection applicator to the tractor.
Load the applicator with manure from a storage tank or pile.
Start the applicator and distribute the manure evenly on the field.
Adjust the applicator settings as needed for different soil conditions.

tasks.task: Mix compost in a yard using a spreader.
subtasks: Drive the spreader to the compost pile.
Load the spreader with compost from the pile.
Distribute the compost evenly over the desired area.
Adjust the spreader settings to achieve appropriate coverage.

tasks.task: Feed livestock using a forage harvester.
subtasks: Operate the forage harvester to cut and collect hay or forage.
Transport the collected forage to the livestock feed area.
Unload the forage into a storage silo or bale it for later use.
Distribute the forage to livestock as per feeding schedule.

tasks.task: Prepare a field for spraying pesticides or fertilizers.
subtasks: Drive the pesticide or fertilizer applicator over the field.
Adjust the applicator nozzles to the correct spray pattern and rate.
Apply the pesticide or fertilizer according to the labeled requirements.
Monitor the application process to ensure even coverage.

tasks.task: Spray a field with pesticides or herbicides.
subtasks: Load the pesticide or herbicide into the spray applicator.
Calibration of the spray applicator.
Drive the sprayer over the field, applying the chemical at the correct pressure and rate.
Secure any leaking systems to prevent contamination.

tasks.task: Operate a self-propelled ground steer to move livestock.
subtasks: Guide the steer through the herd to direct them.
Maneuver the steer to contain livestock in a specific area.
Use flags or herding dogs in conjunction with the steer.

tasks.task: Check for structural integrity of buildings on the farm.
subtasks: Inspect barns, silos, grain storage facilities, and other agricultural buildings.
Look for signs of wear, damage, or potential structural issues.
Document any identified problems for repair or maintenance.

tasks.task: Landscaping tasks around the farm.
subtasks: Clear debris and weeds from around buildings.
Mow grass areas and trim hedges.
Plant flowers or other landscaping elements to improve aesthetics.

tasks.task: Clean out a grain bin.
subtasks: Open the grain bin's access hatch.
Remove old grain and debris from the bin floor.
Sweep or vacuum the bin walls and roof.
Check for any infestations or moisture damage.

tasks.task: Operate a grain unloading system from a train car.
subtasks: Align the unloading system's bucket elevators with the train car doors.
Start the unloading process and monitor the grain flow.
Switch between different cars if multiple cars are present.
Stop the unloading when all cars are empty or as needed.

tasks.task: Load grain onto a train car from a silo.
subtasks: Position the train car under the silo's unloader.
Start the silo unloader and monitor grain flow into the car.
Secure the car's doors once loading is complete.

tasks.task: Handle grain with a grain elevator.
subtasks: Operate the bucket elevator to move grain from ground level to storage.
